transcript:
Executive: Namaskar, IndiaMART mein aapka swagat hai. Main Shweta, aapki kya sahayata kar sakti hoon?
Customer: Hello, haanji. Main S K Enterprises se bol raha hoon. Mera naam hai Satish Kumar.
Executive: Ji Satish ji, bataiye.
Customer: Madam, main aapka paid member hoon, lekin mere paas koi buylead nahi aa raha hai pichle ek hafte se.
Executive: Okay sir. Main check kar leti hoon. Kya aap apna registered mobile number confirm kar sakte hain?
Customer: Haanji, yahi number hai, 9876543282.
Executive: Sir, aapka number hai 9876543282, right?
Customer: Haan, haan, yahi hai.
Executive: Sir, system mein check kar paa rahi hoon, ye number to aapka free listing mein show ho raha hai.
Customer: Free listing? Aise kaise ho sakta hai? Maine to pichle mahine hi payment kiya tha. Silver package liya tha.
Executive: Sir, ek minute hold kijiye, main payment details check karti hoon. (silence) Sir, line pe bane rehne ke liye dhanyawad.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sir, jo payment aapne ki hai, woh aapke doosre number ke liye hui hai, jiska last digit 81 hai.
Customer: 81? Nahi, mera to yahi number hai 82 wala. Maine isi se payment kiya tha.
Executive: Sir, payment to 9876543281 number ke liye receive hui hai. Isliye us number par paid services active hain. Ye 82 wala number aapka free account hai.
Customer: Oh, ho. Ye to gadbad ho gayi. To ab kya ho sakta hai? Kya service is number pe transfer ho sakti hai?
Executive: Sir, service transfer ka policy nahi hai. Aap us number se login karke paid services ka laabh utha sakte hain.
Customer: Lekin main to ye number use karta hoon. Us number ka to mujhe dhyaan bhi nahi tha. To mera paisa wapas mil sakta hai?
Executive: Sir, refund ke liye main aapki request aage forward kar deti hoon. Hamari senior team aapse 24 se 48 ghante mein contact karegi.
Customer: Theek hai. Kar dijiye. Kyunki mujhe is number pe service chahiye ya phir paisa wapas.
Executive: Ji sir, bilkul. Maine aapki request note kar li hai. Iske alawa aur koi jaankari?
Customer: Nahi, bas yahi tha. Dhanyawad.
Executive: IndiaMART mein call karne ke liye dhanyawad. Aapka din shubh ho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads for a week.
- Paid account showing as a free listing.
- Wants to transfer service to a different number.
- Requested a refund for the subscription.

Resolution:

- Informed that payment was made for a different number.
- Clarified the current number is a free listing.
- Explained that service transfer is not possible.
- Raised a request for a callback regarding a refund.

Next Steps: 
- Issue not resolved. A senior team will call back within 24-48 hours regarding the refund request.

Alert (If Any):
- refund

@@@Sentiment:
- Annoyed -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- buyleads, subscription, payment, account status, refund, mobile number
